name: query_fda_adverse_events
description: Queries FDA adverse events database (FAERS) for drug safety information

inputs.name: drug_name
inputs.description: Name of the drug to query

inputs.name: date_range
inputs.description: Date range for the query as [start_date, end_date]

inputs.name: limit
inputs.description: Maximum number of results to return

result.description: Research log with FDA adverse events data
